modShortDescription: Another proof of concept. Adds 2 in game magazines to read on those long nights in base. Goal is to provide a method to allow for in game documentation.
modDescription:
Another proof of concept. Adds 2 in game magazines to read on those long nights in base. Goal is to provide a method to allow for in game documentation that includes images.

**Changelog**  
Updated for latest experimental.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/7D2D/A19Mods/tree/master/BetterBooks)** for A19  
**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/7D2D/A18Mods/tree/master/BetterBooks)** for A18

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/8400-xyths-modlet-collection/).
